snippet: Prosecutors accused her of illegally leaking details of a grand jury investigation, as her lawyer argued that she never would have risked her career by doing such a thing....
abstract: Perjury trial of Pennsylvania State Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane begins, with prosecutors alleging she deliberately released details of grand jury inquiry to media and later lied about her actions; Kane has continued to work as attorney general despite losing law license and calls from Gov Tom Wolf for her to step down.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors accused her of illegally leaking details of a grand jury investigation, as her lawyer argued that she never would have risked her career by doing such a thing.

headline.main: Perjury Trial Begins for Kathleen Kane, Pennsylvania Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Attorney General’s Trial Begins With Claim of Leak as Revenge
